src:
Partizan protiv neporaženog FMP-a: Teška utakmica
01 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Nemanja
Trener Košarkaškog kluba Partizan Andrea Trinkijeri najavio je danas utakmicu petog kola ABA lige sa FMP-om.
Crno-beli, koji igraju sjajno u Evrokupu gde su tokom nedelje upisali i petu uzastopnu pobedu u isto toliko utakmica, dočekuju FMP, koji je neporažen u ABA ligi posle četiri meča.
Andrea Trinkijeri ističe da je prednost FMP-a u tome što su imali više vremena za odmor, ali da se nada trijumfu.
 – Iza nas je dugačak put, zbog puno gostovanja…a ispred nas još duži put do našeg cilja. Dočekujemo FMP koji nema poraz u ABA ligi, koji igra u ritmu jedne utakmice nedeljno, dakle ima vremena za trening i za oporavak, i koji uvek igra sa dodatnim motivom protiv nas. Mi igramo pred svojim navijačima i učinićemo sve da ih pametnom igrom obradujemo – kazao je Trinkijeri.
Krilni centar crno-belih Stefan Birčević smatra da će ovo biti teška i zanimljiva utakmica.
 – Čeka nas veoma važna utakmica protiv veoma talentovane ekipe. Otvorili su sezonu veoma dobro, dobili prve četiri utakmice i sigurno da će sutra biti jako motivisani i da će igrati sa dosta samopouzdanja. Sa druge strane, mi moramo da iskoristimo svoje prednosti i da ih uvedemo u ritam utakmice koji nama više odgovara. Biće to teška, ali verujem i zanimljiva utakmica u kojoj nam pobeda puno znači – kazao je Birčević.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Partizan vs undefeated FMP: Hard match
01 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Nemanja
Partizan Basketball Club coach Andrea Trinkieri today announced the fifth round of the ABA League with FMP.
The black and whites, who play great in Eurocup, where they also registered their fifth consecutive win in as many games during the week, welcome FMP, which is undefeated in the ABA league after four matches.
Andrea Trinkieri points out that the advantage of FMP was that they had more time to rest but hoped for a triumph.
- We have a long way to go, because of a lot of guest appearances ... and a long way ahead of us to our destination. We welcome an FMP that has no defeat in the ABA league, which plays at the rhythm of one game a week, therefore has time for training and recovery, and who always plays with an additional motive against us. We play in front of our fans and we will do our best to make them happy by playing smart - Trinkieri said.
Black and white wing center Stefan Bircevic thinks this will be a difficult and interesting match.
- A very important game is waiting for us against a very talented team. They opened the season very well, won the first four games and will surely be very motivated tomorrow and will play with a lot of confidence. On the other hand, we have to take advantage of them and bring them into the rhythm of the match that suits us better. It will be a difficult one, but I believe an interesting match in which winning means a lot to us - said Bircevic.
